com.cube.storm

Class UiSettings.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.UiSettings.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    UiSettings

    public static class UiSettings.Builder
extends Object
    The builder class for UiSettings. Use this to create a new UiSettings instance with the customised properties specific for your project. Call build() to build the settings object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UiSettings.Builder(Context context)
      Default constructor

      • imageLoaderConfiguration

        public UiSettings.Builder imageLoaderConfiguration(com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.ImageLoaderConfiguration.Builder configuration)
        Sets the default image loader configuration. Note: The ImageDownloader set in the builder is overriden by this method to allow the use of UiSettings.getUriResolvers() to resolve the uris for loading images. Use registerUriResolver(String, com.cube.storm.util.lib.resolver.Resolver) to register any additional custom uris you wish to override. TODO: Find a better way to allow users to use their own imagedownloader, we should not be blocking this config
        Parameters:
        configuration - The new configuration for the image loader
        Returns:
        The UiSettings.Builder instance for chaining

      • registerType

        public UiSettings.Builder registerType(Class instanceClass,
                              ViewProcessor deserializer)
        Registers a deserializer type for a class instance. Use this method to override what processor gets used for a specific view type.
        Parameters:
        instanceClass - The class to register for deserialization
        deserializer - The processor class

        The UiSettings.Builder instance for chaining

      • build

        public UiSettings build()
        Builds the final settings object and sets its instance. Use UiSettings.getInstance() to retrieve the settings instance.
        Returns:
        The newly set UiSettings instance
